name: Laser Defender (Loftus)
description:
Enemy spaceships are attacking earth and you are the only one who can stop them!

Survive waves of enemy attackers, shooting enemy ships while ensuring your ship avoids taking too much damage!

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D

Shoot - Left Click / Spacebar

For the latest changes in v1.1.0, please take a look at the devlog where i mention whats new- v1.1.0 - Endless Update (Devlog)

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated :)
